TITLE: Episode 78 - The Man Behind The Curtain (featuring Brad "Jar Jar" Binkley) [Adult Language]
DESCRIPTION: This week, Jessica and I are joined by the researcher extraordinaire. The man who pours through depressing news stories and scours the deepest parts of the internet for the truth and then presents it daily with Monica Perez on the Propaganda Report. Brad joins us to talk about Brad and all of the things that makes him do what he does and the importance of seeking scary truth in the face of horror.
